result.eng: When did it happen?

result.eng: I fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.
result.ga: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúil
result.orig: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúil

result.eng: He fell on the ground.
result.ga: Thit sé ar an urlár
result.orig: Thit sé ar an urlár
result.html: Thit sé ar an urlárHe fell on the ground.

result.eng: She collapsed on the street.

result.eng: She fell in love with a married man.
result.ga: Thit sí i ngrá le fear pósta

result.html: Thit sí i ngrá le fear póstaShe fell in love with a married man.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit sí i ngrá le fear póstaShe fell in love with a married man.

result.eng: Snow is falling.
result.ga: Tá an sneachta ag titim
result.orig: Tá an sneachta ag titim
result.html: Tá an sneachta ag titimSnow is falling.
result.ponchtml: Tá an sneaċta ag titimSnow is falling.

result.eng: Some airplane just fell from the sky.
result.ga: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéir
result.orig: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéir
result.html: Tá eitleán éigin tar éis titim den spéirSome airplane just fell from the sky.

result.eng: Snow is falling.

result.html: Tá sneachta ag titimSnow is falling.

result.eng: Heavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ga: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.orig: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.html: Thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit báisteaċ ṫrom níos deireanaí an tseaċtain sin agus ṫarla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.

result.eng: He almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ga: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.orig: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.html: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃeag nár ṫit sé as a ẛeasaṁ leis an raḋarc a ḃí os a ċoṁairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.

result.eng: One night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ga: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.orig: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.html: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ponchtml: Oíċe aṁáin ṁoṫaiġ sé go raiḃ sé á ṫaċtaḋ agus ṫit sé ina ċnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.orig: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.html: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.

result.eng: The envelope fell out of his pocket.
result.ga: Thit an clúdach amach as a phóca

result.html: Thit an clúdach amach as a phócaThe envelope fell out of his pocket.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit an clúdaċ amaċ as a ṗócaThe envelope fell out of his pocket.

result.eng: She skidded and fell head-first into the water.
result.ga: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisce

result.eng: That community was worst affected by emigration.

result.eng: This is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.
result.ga: Seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighde
result.orig: Seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighde

result.eng: He thought he'd faint from the sickness.
result.ga: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneas
result.orig: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneas
result.html: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneasHe thought he'd faint from the sickness.

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadhI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósaḋI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!

result.eng: She had fallen out with her mother.
result.ga: Bhí sí tar éis titim amach lena máthair
result.orig: Bhí sí tar éis titim amach lena máthair
result.html: Bhí sí tar éis titim amach lena máthairShe had fallen out with her mother.

result.eng: I liked him very much and we never fell out.
result.ga: Thaitin sé go mór liom agus níor thiteamar amach le chéile riamh

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas

result.html: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.

result.eng: The house is falling apart.

result.html: Tá a saol ag titim as a chéileHer life is falling apart.

result.eng: Máire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.

result.eng: She thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ga: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ga: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.orig: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania

result.ponchtml: Ṫart fán am ar ṫit túr eile an Lárionaid ḃí tuairiscí ag teaċt isteaċ go raiḃ scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ga: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil

result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: He fell on all fours.
result.ga: Thit sé ar a cheithre boinn
result.orig: Thit sé ar a cheithre boinn
result.html: Thit sé ar a cheithre boinnHe fell on all fours.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit sé ar a ċeiṫre boinnHe fell on all fours.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu

result.html: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.orig: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.html: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais ShóivéadaighShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí go Meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an Aontais ṠóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: Milosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ga: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.orig: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.html: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ é Milosevic aṁáin faoi ndear gaċ coir in aġaiḋ na daonnaċta a ṫarla tráṫ titim as a ċéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
